page.title: 08Law and Order
page.content: Law and Order is the responsibility of {Tayside Police}which has its Head- quarters in Forfar.The police station at{Montrose}has a staff of 1 Sergeant and 5 Officers including 1 WPC for each shift.The police are assisted by specially trained lay-men known as Special Constables.The station at Montrose is part of the Eastern Division of the Tayside Police Force. In 1984, according to official Police statistics, 810 crimes were committed in{Montrose.}Of those crimes, 352 were detected, 355 were undetected and 103 were classed as not being crimes. Most of the crimes committed were minor ones.
